entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQC.IFRS.0129.9625] It is expected that ProfitLossAttributableToOwnersOfParent with a value of -222,000,000 reported in the network role http://voestalpineag.com/xbrl/2021/roles/KonzernGesamtergebnisrechnung should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, ProfitLoss with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParentMember and a reported value of -208,800,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://voestalpineag.com/xbrl/2021/roles/KonzernEigenkapitalveraenderungsrechnung. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToOwnersOfParent fact are:
Period : 2019-04-01 to 2020-03-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of ProfitLossAttributableToOwnersOfParent : -5 Decimals of ProfitLoss : -5 Rule version: 17.0.0 - https://filings.xbrl.org/529900ZAXBMQDIWPNB72/2021-03-31/ESEF/AT/0/voestalpineag-2021-03-31.zip/voestalpineag-2021-03-31/reports/voestalpineag-2021-03-31.xhtml 6695

property.name: label
property.value: Profit (loss), attributable to owners of parent

entry.message:

This value appears in the network role http://voestalpineag.com/xbrl/2021/roles/KonzernEigenkapitalveraenderungsrechnung.
